description: Front Garden (Front Boundary) T1: Elderberry tree - Cut by 2 metres back to hard wood height 3m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 1.5m & spread to 1.5m)T2: Robinia tree - Reduce height by 2.5 - 3 metres to just off old points, reduce sides by 2.5 metres to just off old points to balance canopy and maintain an even shape, prune overhang back to clear building by 2 metres, lift canopy by 5 metres (suppressing growth of magnolia), thin canopy by 5 metres, remove major deadwood height 10m & spread 8m. Reduce height to 8m & spread to 6m)T3: Magnolia tree - Prune extended leader overhanging driveway entrance back by 3 metres, prune remaining canopy by 0.5 metre and reshapeheight 12m & spread 6m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 5m)Back Garden (Left Boundary) T8: Mixed hedgerow (rose/holly/laurel/ivy) - Reduce height to stand at around 7ft tall height 12m & spread 6m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 5m)T9: Buddleia tree - Fell to ground level (stump to remain) (Right Boundary) T10: Mock orange tree - Reduce height to stand at around 7ft tallheight 4m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 2m & spread to 2mT11: Mock orange tree - Reduce height to stand at around 7ft tallheight 4m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 2m & spread to 2mT12: Dead elderberry tree - Reduce height to stand at around 7ft tallheight 4m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 2m & spread to 2mT13: Sycamore tree - Remove new growth from previously felled treeheight 4m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 2m & spread to 2mReason for work: More light, clearance from building maintaining this tree in its current setting, overhanging foot path
